events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 28th, 2024, involving damage to the front bumper and airbag deployment.
Review team categorized the claim under Auto Accident after verifying the details about the vehicle involved in the collision.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to manage the case and coordinate further actions with the customer.
The claim was formally acknowledged and the customer was informed that the investigation process would begin shortly.
The agent requested copies of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and insurance policy details for claim assessment.
Customer submitted all required documents including the police report, vehicle repair estimate, and insurance identification.
The claims investigation team began examining the submitted evidence and assessing the circumstances around the auto accident.
Investigation concluded that the customerâ€™s vehicle damage claim was valid and covered under the current auto policy terms.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and analyzing deductible amounts applicable to their policy.
Customer responded expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and confirmed willingness to proceed with repairs.
The claim was officially approved after the customer accepted the settlement terms and agreed on the payout amount.
Payment for the approved claim was issued directly to the repair shop as requested by the customer for timely vehicle service.
The claim case was closed successfully after confirmation from the repair vendor that all work was completed to customer satisfaction.
